name: Cat Splat 2
description:
Cat Splat 2

Following your brother's trail after his disappearance, you enter a mysterious forest and meet its denizens. While they seem friendly and inviting, things aren't always as they seem...

Use your yoyo to redirect your movement and break through leaves on your way down. 

Thanks for playing!

Design:
Casey Stanford

Programming:
Jack Liu

Art:
Nico Rowland
Tim Youn

Audio:
Gordon Feliz
Tyler Liu
Euan Tandiono

there is no cat splat 1
